snippet: Gov. John Kitzhaber’s fiancee admitted Thursday that she broke the law when she married an Ethiopian man seeking to stay in the United States.
abstract: Oregon Gov John Kitzhaber’s fiancee, Cylvia Hayes, admits that she broke the law in 1997 when she married an Ethiopian man seeking to stay in the United States.
lead_paragraph: Gov. John Kitzhaber’s fiancee admitted Thursday that she broke the law when she married an Ethiopian man seeking to stay in the United States.

headline.main: Oregon: Governor’s Fiancée Admits Sham Marriage to Immigrant
headline.print_headline: Oregon: Governor’s Fiancée Admits Sham Marriage to Immigrant
